Description:
Skills:
- Proficient in reading and interpreting electrical blueprints and schematics.
- Extensive knowledge of electrical codes and regulations.
- Experience in installing, maintaining, and repairing electrical systems and equipment.
- Skilled in troubleshooting and resolving electrical issues.
- Familiarity with electrical testing equipment and tools.
- Ability to work independently efficiently complete tasks within deadlines to detail and in following instructions.
- Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills.
- Effective communication and interpersonal skills to with team members and clients.
- Flexibility to adapt to changing work demands and schedules.
- Knowledge of safety procedures and precautions related to electrical work.
- Ability to work at heights and in confined spaces if required.
- Physically fit to handle the demands of the job, including lifting heavy equipment or materials when necessary.
- Basic computer skills and familiarity with electrical software and programs.
- Valid electrical license/certification is preferred.Job Details
